doc:
The widget is a container with just one child. It is not very useful itself, but it is useful for deriving subclasses, since it provides common code needed for handling a single child widget.

Many GTK+ widgets are subclasses of , including , , , or .

methods.doc: Gets the child of the , or null if the bin contains no child widget. The returned widget does not have a reference added, so you do not need to unref it.
methods.name: get_child

name: Bin
